document.full_text: u.n. human rights investigators called on the united states on friday to disclose whether there had been any plan to capture osama bin laden and if he was offered any "meaningful prospect of surrender and arrest."
document.title: u.n. rights investigators seek facts on bin laden death
lines_and_colors: u.n. human rights investigators called on the united states on friday to disclose whether there had been any plan to capture osama bin laden and if he was offered any "meaningful prospect of surrender and arrest."
